aldinar the Wily was a keen-witted but suspicious mage and an adventurer, active some years before the late 13 century DR.
Caldinar was known for creating a collection of enchanted items to aid himself out of a high spot. His paranoid nature ensured that the items were numerous and diverse. One such item from a girdle of ogre blood made out of an ogres tanned hide and infused with the creatures black blood. Caldinar was often found using the magic belt in adventures until his death some years before the . Soon after, Caldinars adventuring companions auctioned his girdle of ogre blood off.
